title: Connection issues
body: I was in a game today when my brother accidentally unplugged the wifi.  I plugged it back in, no big deal; except when my computer was connected to out wifi again, for some reason I couldn't connect back to my lol game.  It just gave me the retry connection message.  This happens every time I try to reconnect to a game after the internet has been turned off and back on.  Is this like a common problem or what?

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC isn't able to properly communicate with our game servers. First, check on your network equipment that your brother messed with and ensure everything is hooked up properly there. You may also want to unplug your modem/router for 60 seconds, just to power cycle the network and clear any potential issues with your router/modem settings. If you still experience this while testing in a custom match (to avoid penalties), then I'd make sure your local network settings are [**configured properly for League.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know what you experienced, as a result of these steps.
